title: Design new landing page
description: Create a modern and responsive landing page design for the company website with focus on user experience and conversion optimization.

title: Implement user authentication
description: Set up secure user authentication system with JWT tokens, password hashing, and session management.

title: Database optimization
description: Optimize database queries and indexes to improve application performance and reduce response times.

title: Mobile app testing
description: Conduct comprehensive testing of the mobile application across different devices and operating systems.

title: API documentation
description: Create comprehensive API documentation with examples and integration guides for developers.

title: Security audit
description: Perform a comprehensive security audit of the application to identify and fix potential vulnerabilities.

title: Performance monitoring setup
description: Implement application performance monitoring and alerting system for production environment.

title: User feedback analysis
description: Analyze user feedback and reviews to identify areas for improvement and new feature requests.
